revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_LowGravity}} '''A_LowGravity'''
(no parameters)
Makes the calling actor subject to low gravity so it will fall down when in mid-air - but very slowly.
== Examples == This pain elemental so sluggish that falls when die too slow, too. Actor SlowPainElem4ZDWiki: [[Classes:PainElemental|PainElemental]] replaces PainElemental { [[Translation]] "64:79=16:47", "128:143=152:159" Speed 4 PainChance 96 [[Health]] 500 States { See: PAIN AAAABBBBCCCC 3 [[A_Chase]]( "" ) Loop Death: PAIN H 8 Bright A_LowGravity PAIN I 8 Bright [[A_Scream]] PAIN JK 8 Bright PAIN L 8 Bright [[A_PainDie]] PAIN M 8 Bright Stop } }
== See also == *[[A_NoGravity]] *[[A_Gravity]] *[[A_SetGravity]]
{{DEFAULTSORT:LowGravity}}[[category:Decorate Status change functions]]
